mean_cn: n. 试验；  v. （on）进行实验
mean_en: a scientific test in which you perform a series of actions and carefully observe their effects in order to learn about something
word_etyma: ex出 + peri尝试 + ment名词后缀 → experiment 实验
sentence: There are many scientists doing experiments to find a cure.
sentence_trans: 为了找到治愈方法，许多科学家在进行实验。
